Title: Relates to the existing special eligible list for public employees
Summary: Provides that the governmental agency shall notify any person on a special eligible list, in writing, that their name will remain on such list for two years after the termination of military duty and shall be removed at the end of the two year period unless such person requests to remain on such list.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the military law, in relation to the existing special eligible list for public employees
